definitions.definition: Synonym of hedonism , particularly ( ethics , chiefly historical ) the specific beliefs of the philosophical school of Aristippus of Cyrene , advocating pursuit of sensual pleasure as the highest good .

main_definition: ( usually derogatory ) Synonym of hedonism , particularly ( ethics , chiefly historical ) the specific beliefs of the philosophical school of Aristippus of Cyrene , advocating pursuit of sensual pleasure as the highest good .
